definition: prisoner of war/to capture/to take prisoner/(old) northern barbarian/slave

sentences.english: The spring and Autumn period, King Wu defeated and captured goujian.
sentences.chinese: 春秋时期，吴王夫差打败并俘虏了越王勾践。

sentences.english: My dad's been captured by a hoe! What am I going to do?!
sentences.chinese: 我爸爸被那个烂货俘虏了，我该怎么办？

sentences.english: The prince's presence stirs hope among the captive Mon Calamari.
sentences.chinese: 王子的现身在蒙卡拉马里俘虏中激起了希望。

sentences.english: One of my jawans brought me tea (without milk and sugar) every day during the time we were prisoners.
sentences.chinese: 当俘虏期间，我的其中一名士兵每天给我送茶。

sentences.english: At last, they brought a captive from deep within the ship.
sentences.chinese: 最后他们从船舱底部带上来一个俘虏。

sentences.english: When the Empire discovered Endor, the Marauders captured the Imperial scouting party.
sentences.chinese: 帝国发现恩多时，劫掠者俘虏了帝国侦察队。

sentences.english: The others run off in panic, leaving one of their prisoners behind.
sentences.chinese: 其余的丢下一个俘虏仓惶逃走。

sentences.english: As a prisoner of Vader, Leia underwent terrible torture aboard the Death Star.
sentences.chinese: 莱娅被维德俘虏后，在死星上遭受了可怕的折磨。

sentences.english: Several weeks after I left the Aïr, the commander released the prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 我离开阿伊尔高原几周后，指挥官释放了那名俘虏。

sentences.english: A second prison was checked, with the same result.
sentences.chinese: 有检查了另一个俘虏营，仍是同样的结果。

sentences.english: Using an isolated horse barn, he sells his captives to the highest bidder.
sentences.chinese: 使用一个孤立的马厩，他出售他的俘虏以价高者得。

sentences.english: Digital captives are, after all, cheaper to sustain than the real ones.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟数码俘虏总比真的把他们关键牢房更节省成本。

sentences.english: Q. What happens to a commander card after the corresponding commander is captured?
sentences.chinese: 当相应的将领被俘虏后将领卡发生什么变化？

sentences.english: He guarded prey to the counting-house .
sentences.chinese: 他押着他的俘虏到帐房间去。

sentences.english: However, Joan was captured during a battle and put on trial.
sentences.chinese: 然而圣女贞德却在一场战役中被俘虏而遭到审判。

sentences.english: They were for the first time given horse-flesh to eat.
sentences.chinese: 俘虏们第一次得到的食品是马肉。

definition: an execution/to put sb to death
